In t__ end, that sk___ will ta__ you far____ than succe_____ at every_____ you fa__. Success often requires some luck, but determination and hard work are within your control.
data.fullContent: Success is not as important as determination. Even if you fail, you should act to work your hardest to solve a problem. In the end, that skill will take you farther than successful at everything you face. Success often requires some luck, but determination and hard work are within your control.
data.answer: 成功没有决心重要。即使你失败了，你也应该尽最大努力去解决问题。最终，这种技能会让你在面对任何事情时都更加成功。成功往往需要一些运气，但决心和努力是可以控制的。
